El se dedica a la producción de café desde hace veinte años, siempre ha sido su fuente de trabajo y de ingresos. La producción la vende en los mercados locales o intermediarios. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 25,000 Lempiras para darle mantenimiento al cultivo, invertirá en fertilizantes y limpieza para obtener mejor producción. Su plan es mantener bien sus cultivos para poderles dejar una herencia a sus hijos en un futuro.
texts.en: Ciriaco, 56, is married and has four children.  He lives in a village belonging to Taulabe Municipality, Comayagua.   He’s worked growing coffee for twenty years; it’s always been his source of work and income.  He sells his production in the local markets or to middlemen.  He’s asking for a 25,000 Lempira loan to provide crop maintenance.  He will buy fertilizer and do the weeding to obtain better crop yields.  His plan is to keep him crops in good condition to be able to leave his children an inheritance in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Maricela Del Carmen

texts.es: Maricela es una mujer emprendedoras de éxito, casada, con 32 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos de 15, 10, 9 y 3 años de edad, su negocio es tener un cafetín estudiantil en un colegio público cerca de su comunidad, esta actividad tiene 3 años de dedicarse a eso.  Comercializa comida, gaseosas, jugos de latas, jugos de caja, meneítos, helados, bolis, enchiladas, tacos, frutas frescas etc. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos como gaseosas coca cola, granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, chiverías, jugos de latas, jugos de caja, tortillas, carne de res, carne de pollo, sal, pimientas, salsa de tomate, cebolla, chiltoma,  bolis, etc.
texts.en:
Maricela is a successful enterprising woman.  She’s 32, married and has four children aged 15, 10, 9 and 3.  Her business is a snack shop in a local public school near her community.  She’s been in this line of work for three years.  She sell food, soft-drinks, canned juice, boxed juice, cheese puffs, ice-cream, frozen treats, enchiladas, tacos, fresh fruit, etc.

She will use the loan to buy products like soft-drinks, Coca-Cola, basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, oil, snacks, canned juice, boxed juice, tortillas, beef, chicken, salt, pepper, tomato sauce, onions, peppers, frozen treats, etc.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her food stand.

loans.name: Concepción De Lourdes

texts.es: Concepción,  tiene 36 años de edad, es casada su esposo reside en el extranjero, vive en una aldea de Peña Blanca, Cortes junto a sus tres hijos. Tiene varios años de tener su negocio de pulpería que con muchos esfuerzos y con la ayuda de los prestamos a podido mantenerlo activo y sacar para el sustento diario de la familia. Ella ha logrado mantener su negocio con la buena administración y con la ayuda de su esposo. Vende productos alimenticos como, huevos, manteca, frijoles, azúcar, harina, leche, refrescos y productos de abarrotería como, jabón, desinfectantes, pastas dentales, papel higiénico entre otros. Ha solicitado tres préstamos anteriores a ODEF, de los cuales dos han sido financiados por Kiva. Y actualmente solicita el cuarto préstamo por 20,000 lempiras para comprar productos alimenticios y de abarrotería como, papel higiénico, jabón para lavar y de baño, desinfectante, pastas dentales, granos básicos, lácteos, refrescos, manteca, azúcar etc. Para ofrecer mejor variedad de productos a los clientes y así su negocio pueda crecer aun mas en clientes. Continua con su meta de hacer crecer el negocio y poderles dar el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Concepción is 36 and married. Her husband lives outside the country, and she lives in the town of Peña Blanca with her three children. For several years, she has run a small grocery store through hard work and with loans so that she could support her family. She has kept the business going through good management and her husband's help. She sells grocery items like soap, disinfectant, toothpaste,toilet paper, and more. 

She has had three loans with ODEF, which were financed through Kiva. She is applying for a loan of 20,000 to buy grocery items like toilet paper, bath soap, disinfectant, toothpaste, basic grains, milk products, beverages, margarine, and sugar so that she can offer her customers more variety and attract even more customers. She will work toward her goal to grow her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to stock her shop with groceries.

loans.name: Sabit

texts.en:
Sabit is a 53-year-old married male. He is married and his wife is a housewife. For the past ten years Sabit has owned his own food store in order to make a living. He provides products to all nationalities that live in his community in Kosovo and really enjoys his business of selling food.

He is requesting this loan in order to buy food products for his market, such as sugar, tea, salt, oil and various beverages. Sabit hopes that the loan will help him to increase the size of his market and the amount of products he can supply, thereby increasing his income and then improving his living conditions. His goal is to expand his business and then expand his family. He is very happy for the financial support from the lenders!

loans.use: To buy sugar, tea, salt, oil and various beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy egg hatching machines/incubators for the poultry farm.

loans.name: Moustafa

texts.en:
Moustafa is a married youth client from Iraq. He is 23 years old and lives with his parents and 2 brothers. Moustafa is the sole provider in the family.

Moustafa owns a bakery and provides his neighborhood with bread. He has been practicing this business since 2011 and has gained a lot of experience in this field. Now, Moustafa has three employees and thanks to the good quality of his goods for sale, Moustafa has gained a good reputation and the respect of the surrounding area.

Moustafa is requesting a youth loan of 1,800 USD. He will use this loan to buy a big gas bottle along with its pipes and all the necessary equipment and connect it to his oven. By this way, he will provide more gas to his oven and will increase his productions. Moustafa aims to continue to grow in this field and expand his business so that he may satisfy his family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy a big gas bottle along with its pipes and all the necessary equipment

loans.name: Sughra

texts.en:
Sughra is a hardworking woman. She has been running a business of tailoring for a period of about six years to support her husband financially, as her husband’s income is not sufficient to meet household expenses alone. Her husband is a teacher by profession. 

She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she requested a loan of Rs. 20,000/- to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons and laces, etc. In this way she will be able to meet with the increasing demand of her regular customers without fail. 

Sughra hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her five children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads, packs of buttons and laces, etc.

loans.name: Crúz

texts.es:
CRUZ TIENE 51 AÑOS DE EDAD, ESTA CASADO Y TIENE DOS HIJOS. DESDE HACE UNOS 3 AÑOS TRABAJA COMPRANDO Y VENDIENDO CHATARRA EN LA COMUNIDAD Y ALREDEDORES TRANPORTANDOSE EN UN PICK UP VIEJITO QUE POSEE ESTEA ACTIVIDA LA REALIZA; YA QUE LE GENERA LOS RECURSOS NECESARIOS PARA SUBSISTIR CON SU ESPOSA EN LA CASA ,YA QUE SUS HIJAS YA SON MAYORES DE EDAD Y HAN FORMADO HOGARES APARTE. 

 ANTES SE DEDICABA A LA QUIEBRA DE PIEDRAS PARA CONTRUCCION EN LA MINA DE PIEDRAS QUE RESULTO  DE LA LAVA QUE SE DERRAMO DEL VOLCAN CHAPARRASTIQUE HACE VARIOS AÑOS.    

EL CLIENTE COMPRA TODO EL MATERIAL RECICLABLE DE METAL EN SU COMUNIDA Y ALREDEDORES TRANSPORTANDOSE EN SU PICK UP QUE ES DE AÑO 89. EL SALE DE SU CASA TODOS LOS DIAS MUY TEMPRANO RECOLECTA UNA CANTIDAD CONSIDERABLE Y LUEGO LA TRANPORTA A LA CIUDAD A LOS ACAPARADORES QUE LUEGO LA MANDAN ALAS FUNDIDORAS      


EL PRESTAMO SOLICITADO SERA INVERTIDO EN LA CONSTUCCION DE PUERTAS DE METAL PARA SU CASA; YA QUE ACTUALMENTE SON DE MADERA Y CUANDO SALEN CON SU ESPOSA LA CASA ESTA SUJETA  A QUE LE FALSEEN LAS PUERTAS Y LE ROBEN LOS POCOS BIENES QUE HASTA LA FECHA TIENE Y LA CONSTRUCCION DEL TECHO DE EL CORREDOR DE SU CASA YA QUE ACTUALMENTE TIENE UNA CARPETA PLASTICA QUE LE DA SOLO SONBRA Y HOY EN LA EPOCA DE LLUVIAS SE LE M0JA TODO Y TEME QUE SE LE DETEREORE LA MADERA.  


SU VIDA MEJORARA AL MANTENER SU CASA MAS SEGURA CON PUERTAS Y VENTANAS CONFIABLES Y SU PICK UP YA NO ESTARA A LA INTERPERIE EN LA EPOCA DE LLUVIAS    


EN UN FUTURO EL CLIENTE PLANEA HACER EL PISO DE SU CASA E INSTALAR LA ENERGIA ELECTRICA YA QUE ACTUALMENTE SE ILUMINA CON UNA LAMPARA COLEMEN DE GAS.
texts.en:
Cruz is 51 years old, married and has two children. For 3 years he has been working purchasing and selling scrap in his community and the surrounding areas, driving himself around in an old pick up truck that he has. This activity generates enough money to support his wife at home, since his daughters are already grown and have made homes of their own. 

Before, he was working breaking apart rocks that are being used as construction material found in a mine that formed because of the lava from the volcano that erupted a few years ago. 

He purchases recyclable metal material in his community and the surrounding areas in his 89 pick up truck. He leaves from his house very early every day and collects a considerable amount of material and then he takes it to the city Acaparadores. 
  
The loan requested will be invested in the construction of metal doors for his house. Currently, the doors are made of wood and when he leaves with his wife the house is vulnerable to being broken into and robbed of the few goods they have. To date, he has built a roof and he also has a plastic carpet and today in the rainy season everything is wet and he fears that the wooden doors will deteriorate.     

His life will improve with the repairs made to the house with more secure windows and doors and his pick up won't be exposed to the elements during the rainy season. 

In the future, he plans to add onto his home and to install electricity since he currently lights his home with a gas light.

loans.use: construct metal doors for his house.

loans.name: Paublino

texts.es: Paublino,  es de la comarca  El Zapote , casado tiene 8  hijos, los cuales  ya solo tiene  a cargo 4 hijos y un nieto  y solo un 1 hijo de 11 años tiene en la escuela de la comarca que actualmente estudia el 5to grado de primaria, su esposa  es ama de casa . Don Paublino es un pequeño agricultor que se dedica a cultivar maíz, frijol y trigo desde que tenía 14 años trabaja cultivando la tierra  para esa época todo era manualmente no se necesitaba de insumos como ahora  que son fundamentales para sacar una mejor producción, el posee sus tierras donde trabaja, sus vacas que ha comprado  la obtuvo con ingresos de sus cosechas, para hacer sus huertas lo hace con la ayuda de sus hijos y ya cuando saca la cosecha la lleva a vender al mercado de Boaco Paublino dice que le gustaría llevar a vender su cosecha al mercado de Managua ya  que allá le pagan mejor.  Él está solicitando este crédito para comprar un panel solar en su casa ya que no tiene luz eléctrica por la distancia de la comunidad  razón por la cual siempre ha usado la luz a través de candil a base de gas.  Paublino también relata que con la adquisición de este nuevo sistema de luz panel solar su familia y su casa estará en mejores condiciones ya que no estará encendiendo candil  y a cualquier hora de la noche tendrá luz además que le ayudara para atender su pulpería que es un nuevo negocio que  tiene y que administra su esposa.
texts.en:
Paublino is from the El Zapote district.   He’s married and has 8 children but only four of them are still in his care.  He also has a grandson and only one 11-year-old son is attending the local school; he’s a fifth-grader.  His wife’s a housewife.

Paublino is a small farmer who has worked growing corn, beans and wheat since he was 14-years-old.  He works tilling the soil.  Back in those days all the work was done by hand and supplies weren’t needed like they are now; they are now fundamental in order to produce better crops.  He owns the land he works and he’s purchased his cows with income earned from the harvests.  His children help him create his orchards and when he gathers his harvests he sells them in the market in Boaco. Paublino says that he’d like to sell his crops in Managua because they pay better there.

He’s asking for this loan to buy a solar panel for his house because he does not have electricity because he’s far from the community so he’s always lighted his house with a gas lamp.  Paublino also relates that by acquiring this new solar panel system his family and his house will be in better conditions because they won’t be lighting lamps any longer and they will have light at all hours of the night too which will help him tend to his grocery store which is a new business he has that his wife manages.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.fr: Cecilia est une femme de 57 ans veuve mère de famille. Elle est commerçante et fait la vente en détail des vivres frais( tomates, gombo, légumes, maniocs, plantains) en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 20 ans. Elle a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'elle a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Mais elle se retrouve constamment en rupture de stock parce qu'elle est obligée de faire écouler tous le stock pour pouvoir s'en procurer à nouveau ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital. Elle souhaiterai augmenter son stock de vivres en achetant en gros ceci augmentera non seulement ses ventes mais aussi son bénéfice. Bénéfice qu'elle réinvestira en partie dans son activité pour l'agrandir et le reste lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Cecilia is a 57-year-old woman.  She is a widow and the mother of some children.  She is involved in retail and sells fresh produce (tomato, okra, vegetables, cassava, plantains), depending on the season, at a local market.  She has been involved in this activity for 20 years.

Cecilia knows her suppliers and also her customers particularly well, as she has built her customer base over time, thanks to her experience in this field. However, because of her small capital, she always has to sell all her stock of merchandise before she can buy more goods. As a consequence, she is constantly out of stock.

Cecilia would like to increase her stock of food products and buy bulk quantities of produce, which will not only increase her sales but also her profits.

She plans to reinvest part of her profits in her business, in order to expand it.  She will use the rest of the money to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to increase her stock of plantain crates.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: El sr. Alfredo tiene 47 años, se caso con la Sra. Lydia, con la cual tiene 7 hijos; actualmente viven en una casa en anticrético en el cual viven todos sus hijos y el sr. Alfredo. En anteriores gestiones el sr. Alfredo trabajaba en una empresa de curtiembre donde fabricaban cinturones, carteras, chamarras, zapatos de cuero, etc. pero esto afecto a sus pulmones del cliente debido a que estaba en contacto con los químicos para dicha fabricación, es por esto que le dieron de baja y pagarle pensiones por dicha empresa, es por esto que no trabaja en ninguna empresa pero es ayudante de albañil ya que los ingresos de las pensiones no le alcanzan para los gastos familiares. El crédito solicitado es para la construcción de habitaciones para sus hijos, en un pequeño terreno que se compro.
texts.en: Alfredo, 47, is married to Lydia, with whom he has seven children. They and their children live in a house in Anticrético. Formerly, Alfredo worked for a tanner, which made belts, wallets, vests, leather shoes, and more. This work affected his lungs because he was exposed to production chemicals; therefore, he no longer works for a business. He is a bricklayer's assistant because his pension is not enough to pay his household expenses. He has applied for a loan to build rooms for his children on a small plot he bought.

loans.use: to build rooms.

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назире 32 года. Она разведенная и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Детям 13 и 11 лет. Назира не смотря на трудности жизни, держится мужественно и старается идти к новшеству. Его муж бросил ее и не помогает по обеспечению детей, поэтому Назира является единственной кормилицей своих 2 детей. Она более 5 лет ведет свой бизнес. Она занимается купле продажей продуктов питания. Вначале она занималась шитьём женской одежды, но так как спрос на продукты питания больше, она перешла на купле продажи продуктов питания. Она продает консервы, макарон, сахар, хлеб, а также порошок и моющие средства. Она хочет развевать бизнес дальше и поэтому она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки продуктов питания для увелечения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nazira is 32 years old and has two children, ages 11 and 13. Despite the difficulties in her life, Nazira is brave and tries hard to improve her situation. Her husband left her and does not provide any child support so she is raising the children on her own. She has been running her own business for five years. At first she sewed women's clothing, but switched to selling groceries because of the higher demand for food than for clothing. She sells canned goods, pasta, sugar, bread, and laundry detergents. She wants to expand her business and has asked for a loan of 3000 somoni to buy more grocery products and increase her working capital. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy grocery products and increase working capital

loans.name: Macario

texts.es: El señor Macario, es una persona de 25 años de edad de estado civil soltero, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con un dependiente económico a cargo el cual es su pequeño hijo, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico, que se halla situado en la Comunidad de Tíraque, su actividad económica es la producción agrícola, de tal forma indica que produce anualmente papa, haba y arveja. Por otro lado el Sr. Macario manifiesta ser una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que quiere mejorar su condición económica en la vida y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de operación para compra de una yunta de toros para así mejorar la producción y poder mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Macario, 25, is single.  He was able to complete elementary school.  He has one dependent, his little boy.  He lives in his own rustic house located in the community of Tíraque.  His economic activity is agricultural production.  He grows potatoes, lima beans and peas annually.  On the other hand, Macario states that he’s a hardworking, very responsible person who wants to improve his economic condition in life and to do so needs to request working capital to buy a team of oxen to improve production and increase income.

loans.use: to buy bulls.

loans.name: Oscar Hafed

texts.es: Oscar tiene 21 años es soltero,  es una persona responsable,  trabaja hace 2 años como maestro de carpintería de aluminio donde hace estantes y muebles de aluminio combinados con vidrio. Oscar vive en el mismo lugar donde trabaja que es a casa de sus padres, Oscar está sacando este crédito para poder hacer arreglos en la vivienda en la que vive y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida, en un futuro quiere solicitar otro crédito para poder construir su propia vivienda, también quiere abrir su propia carpintería para tener mejores ingresos  y tener su propio negocio.
texts.en: Oscar, 21, is single. He’s a responsible person.  He’s worked for the last two years as a master aluminum carpenter making shelving and aluminum and glass furniture.  Oscar lives in the same place where he works which is his parents’ house.  Oscar is taking out this loan in order to do some repairs in the house he lives in and to be able to have better quality of life.  In future, he’d like to request another loan to build his own house and he’d also like to open his own carpentry shop in order to earn higher income and to own his own business.

loans.use: to repair his house.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es: El sr. Elías tiene 31 años de edad, convive con la Sra. Alieta con la cual tiene 2 hijos dependientes, estos estudian el nivel primario, el sr. Elias y su familia vive en la casa de sus padres,  el sr. Elias estudio hasta el nivel primario en una escuela fiscal esto fue debido a que no hubo suficientes recursos económicos por parte de sus padres para hacer estudiar a todos sus hijos, por lo que el sr. Elías decidió trabajar desde joven en diferentes actividades que le generaran recursos económicos. Actualmente el sr. Elias tiene como actividad principal el servicio de explotación de agregados, donde trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 5:30 am.  El crédito solicitado es para el mantenimiento y reparación de su volqueta, lo que le permitirá seguir con su actividad y en un futuro ahorrar para la compra de un pequeño terreno para su vivienda.
texts.en:
Elías, 31, lives with Alieta with whom he has two dependent children attending primary school.  Elías and his family live in his parents’ house.  Elías completed primary school in a public school because his parents did not have sufficient resources so all their children could attend school which is why Elías decided to work when since he was young in various income generating activities.

At present, Elías’ main activity is exploiting rock quarries; he works Monday to Saturday starting at 5:30am.  The requested loan is to service and repair his excavator which will make it possible to stay in business and in future to save up to buy a small piece of land for his house.

loans.use: to service and repair his dump truck.

loans.name: Geronimo

texts.es: El señor Geronimo, es una persona de 49 años de edad de estado civil casado, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, cuenta con dos dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus pequeños hijos, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico, su actividad económica es de brindar servicios de mano de obra hace tres años atrás en una granja privada de ganados bovinos lecheros de la misma población. Finalmente el señor Geronimo y su esposa manifiestan tener el deseo de poder superarse y al mismo tiempo mejorara la condición de su vivienda, para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital para compra de materiales de construcción para vivienda, y de tal forma poder mejorar su vivienda y al mismo tiempo también mejorar la calidad de vida de sus dependientes.
texts.en:
Gerónimo, 49, is married.  He was able to complete primary school.  He has two dependents in his care, his children.  He lives in his own house which is of rustic style.  His economic activity is being a laborer; he’s worked for the last three years in a local private dairy farm.

Gerónimo and his wife have expressed a desire for self-improvement while at the same time improving the conditions of their house.  To do so, they need to request capital to buy building supplies for the house in order to do the improvements while at the same time improving the quality of life of their dependents.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Shavkat

texts.ru: Шавкат трудолюбивый человек. Ему 31 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Детям 3 года и 7 месяца. Он более 3 лет занимается предоставлением услуги такси. Он до этого работал в ГЭС простым рабочим. Шавкат данное время ведет свой бизнес успешно. Он имеет свою машину, и каждый день с утра до вечера предоставляет услугу такси. После того, как он начал свой бизнес, его доход увеличивается, и уровень проживания улучшается. Он планирует отремонтировать свой дом, так как его дом имеет плохое состояние. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1300 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, древесину и т.п. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shavkat is a hard-working man. He is 31 years old, married and has two children, ages 3 years and 7 months. He previously worked at the hydroelectric power plant, but has been a taxi driver for the past three years. Shavkat has his own car and works from morning to evening. His business is currently successful and his income and quality of life have improved. He now plans to renovate his house, as it is in bad condition. He has requested a loan of $1300 to purchase construction materials such as cement and wood. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials such as cement and wood for house repairs

loans.name: Rosaira

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Rosaíra, quien con su credikiva pudo comprar artículos de tocador, como cremas corporales, perfumes de hombre y mujer, talcos perfumados, desodorantes; pudiendo atender los pedidos de sus clientes. Con esto logró ampliar el capital de trabajo de su negocio, fortaleciéndolo, incrementando su clientela. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo crédito para invertir en la compra de productos por catálogos, como perfumes, cremas, champú, vestidos de mujer, artículos de bisutería, como collares, aretes, brazaletes, y calzado. Rosaíra dice a sus financiadores: “Gracias por el apoyo recibido, a Kiva le debe que hoy su negocio sea más prospero y productivo.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Rosaíra who used her Kiva loan to buy beauty products like body cream, perfume for men and women, scented talc and deodorant thus filling customer orders.  She was able to expand her business’ working capital strengthening it and increasing her clientele.

She’s currently applying for a new loan to buy catalog merchandise like perfume, cream, shampoo, women’s dresses, costume jewelry like necklaces, earrings, bracelets and shoes.  Rosaíra says to her lenders: “Thank you for all the support received.  I owe my business being more productive and prosperous today to Kiva.”

loans.use: to buy catalog merchandise.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es: El Sr. Elias vive en la comunidad de Colomi en la casa de sus padres, tiene 22 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, económicamente es independiente, se dedica a la agricultura siembra en terreno de herencia de sus padres donde produce papa, papaliza y haba en vaina verde, con rotación de cultivos con experiencia en el rubro, además cuenta con cabezas de ganado vacuno 3 lecheras y 2 de engorde. El sr Elias requiere el crédito para la construcción de vivienda (compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena), por este motivo se apersono  a solicitar un préstamo, ya que el ahorro que tenía lo invirtió en compra de insumos agrícolas.                                                                                                                                                                       Por ultimo Elias se sintió contento al tener la oportunidad de acceder al crédito, además entusiasmado por el inicio de construcción de su propia vivienda y  poder contar con la ayuda de la institución porque, ahora podrá,  vivir en su casa propia.
texts.en:
Elias lives in his parents’ house in the Colomi community.  He is 22 years old, single, and financially independent.  

He farms land that he inherited from his parents.  He produces potatoes, ‘papaliza’ [a tuber], and green beans.  He rotates his crops, and he has experience in this line of work.  He also has heads of cattle, three dairy and two to fatten. 

Elias needs the loan to build his house (to purchase bricks, cement, and sand).  That is why he came to request a loan; because he used the savings that he had to buy agricultural supplies.

Lastly, Elias is happy to have the opportunity to access the loan.  Also, he is enthusiastic about starting to build his own house and to be able to have help from the institution.  This is because he will now be able to live in his own house.

loans.use: to build his house.

loans.name: David

texts.es: El señor David, es una persona de 34 años de edad, de estado civil casado, alcanzo a estudiar hasta bachillerato, actualmente cuenta con dos dependientes económicos las cuales son sus hijas, la actividad económica principal del señor David es venta de materiales de construcción, de tal forma anualmente en promedio realiza la venta de los siguientes productos: Cemento, vigas y yeso. La tienda está establecida en su propia casa, por otro lado el Señor David manifiesta ser una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere superarse económicamente en la vida  y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de operación para la compra de material de construcción, de tal forma con las ventas poder mejorar sus ingresos por lo tanto también la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
David is 34 years old. He is married and has a high school education. Currently, he has two daughters who are financially dependent on him. David makes a living selling construction materials from a store run out of his home. His principal products are cement, plaster, and beams. 

David is a hardworking and responsible man who wants to improve his financial situation. He is requesting this loan in order to have operating capital with which to buy construction materials for his store. The profits from selling these supplies will improve his earnings and his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Mathieu Jasmin

texts.fr: Mathieu est une jeune homme de 37 ans fiancé, père de famille.Il a ouvert une  parfumerie qu'il gère depuis 15 ans déjà. Il a souvent un problème du a l'absence de produits cosmétiques, mèches, et greffes dans son institut parce qu'il achète ses produits en détail. Son but étant de satisfaire sa clientèle et de réaliser un grand bénéfice. Il sollicite un crédit pour pouvoir acheter son matériel en grande quantité celui qui permettra d'atteindre ses objectifs. Le bénéfice tiré de ce crédit l'aidera a satisfaire ses besoins, ceux de sa famille, aussi d'épargner pour accroitre son activité dans le future.
texts.en:
Mathieu, aged 37, is a young man who is engaged and has a family.  Fifteen years ago already, he opened and started managing a perfume store.  He is often faced with a shortage of cosmetic products, hair extensions and weaves because he buys his merchandise in retail quantities.

Mathieu's goal is to be able to meet his customers' demand and to make large profits.  This is why he is requesting a loan which will help him to buy goods in bulk quantities and reach his goals.

The profits from this loan will help him to meet his needs, those of his family, and also to save some money to expand his business in the future.

loans.use: to increase his stock of hair extensions and cosmetic products.

loans.name: Patience's Group

texts.en:
The responsible Patience’s self-help squad is made up of three members. This group is part of Mandzano self-help, the mother group. The members of Patience's Self-Help squad are made up of two women and a man from the district of Teshie in Accra, Ghana.

One of them is Patience, who was selected as their leader. She is a 22-year-old woman living with her husband and two children. She sells fish products in the nearby market. The fish is used for preparation of a variety of foods and has good protein content. She sells different types of fish depending upon the demand of her customers. She has requested a loan to purchase more cartons of fish. She has a very good relationship with her customers because she completes their orders on time.

Patience is requesting a loan of GHS 800 to buy one carton of fish to sell to customers. Emmanuel sells fishing equipment and Mangue sells ceramic and glass products.

loans.use: To buy one carton of fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Inkome Nfa Group

texts.en:
Emelia is a member of ‘Inkome Nfa’ group. She has been a client of ID Ghana for three years and has taken five loans. She is a hardworking mother who works intensely for the well-being of her two children.

Emelia is the motor that drives this tireless group. She sells cosmetics, fish, ready-made items, bags, and maize (corn), as well as soft drinks. The new injection of business capital from this loan will help buy two cartons of tuna fish, which will help because her client base has increased considerably. With the previous loans she was able to improve her family's living conditions and meet one of her short term goals - to fully pay her children's school fees. 

Together with Leticia are four other members of the group, all very dedicated, with wishes to get ahead. They need a total amount of GHS 5,600 to realize improvement in their businesses.

loans.use: To buy two cartons of tuna fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Gombre Group

texts.fr:
Mr SAYOUBA représente le groupe  GOMBRE. Il est célibataire sans enfant.
Mr est tailleur depuis 04ans. Il s’approvisionne au marché de secteur dix en ville. Ses clients sont les amis et voisins.
Mr veut s’acheter 01 machine à coudre.
Il épargne ses bénéfices. Mr ambitionne agrandir son d’activité et aider ses parents dans les charges  familiales.
texts.en: Mr. SAYOUBA represents the group GOMBRE. He is unmarried and without children. A tailor for four years, he gets his supplies at the Sector 10 market. His customers are friends and neighbors. Mr. SAYOUBA is purchasing a sewing machine. He saves his profits. His ambition is to expand his business and help out his parent to cover family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Tereza Elena

texts.es:
Teresa ha crecido en su negocio con la ayuda del último crédito que recibió en Fundación Alternativa. Paralelamente a su negocio de comida ha podido adquirir ropa, cosméticos y bisutería que vende en su casa y en donde administra y organiza los pedidos que le hacen sus nuevos clientes. Ella espera poder comprar maniquíes para exhibir la ropa en su casa y que quienes le visitan en busca de alguna prenda puedan visualizar de mejor manera el producto que ella ofrece. Teresa sueña con poder dar a sus hijos la educación que ella no pudo obtener, es por esto que su espíritu emprendedor la ha llevado a ocupar su tiempo libre en este emprendimiento comercial que lo puede llevar a cabo sin descuidar su familia y su negocio de comida. 
Teresa espera el apoyo de todos los inversionistas de Kiva para poder engrandecer su negocio y poder cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en: Teresa has grown in business thanks to the previous loan she got from Fundación Alternativa.  Alongside her food business she’s been able to acquire clothes, cosmetics and costume jewelry that she sells from home; she manages and organizes orders placed by her new customers there.  She hopes to be able to buy mannequins to display the clothes at home so that people visiting her to look for clothes can better visualize what she has on offer.  Teresa dreams with being able to provide her children with an education she was unable to get and this is why her enterprising spirit has brought her to use her free time in this commercial venture that she can carry out without neglecting her family or her food business.  Teresa hopes for support from all Kiva lenders in order to enlarge her business and be able to reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es: Teofilo, está en unión libre, tiene la edad 79 años y vive con su esposa e hijos. El con el crédito pretende comprar abonos y semilla para mejorar sus repastos. El tiene ya desde varios años que se dedica a la ganadería y cree favorable hacerle estas mejoras a sus terrenos. El tiene como meta poder mejorarlos para que sus animales puedan estar en mejores condiciones de alimentación y así poder tenerlos listos para la venta más pronto. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Teófilo lives in a common law relationship.  He’s 79-years-old and lives with his wife and children.  He intends to use the loan to buy manure and seeds to improve his pasture.  He’s been working raising cattle for several years now and he thinks that making these improvements to his land is a good idea.  His goal is to improve it so that his animals will have better feeding conditions so he can get them ready for sale sooner.  This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans from state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family. Rowena is married and has a buy-and-sell smoked fish business in the Philippines.

Rowena requested a PHP 12,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional smoked fish to sell.

Rowena has been in this business for nine years now. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional smoked fish to sell.

loans.name: Susan Andrea

texts.es:
Susan  es una joven soltera de 26 años, que concluyó sus estudios universitarios con muchos éxitos, 
Ella estudió para ser profesora de Educación Inicial, actualmente ella se encuentra trabajando en una colegio particular, enseñando a los más pequeños  (niños de 5 años de edad).
Susan ya trabaja con nuestra empresa (EDAPROSPO) hace 06 meses, ella invertirá el préstamo  solicitado para sus  trámites de Bachiller y Titulación. Uno de sus más apreciados sueños es  lograr su titulación como “Docente en Educación Inicial”, ya que le así tendrá más oportunidades Laborales.
Ella está muy emocionada por el préstamo obtenido, ya que esto le ayudará agilizar los trámites que corresponden en la  universidad.
Susan se siente agradecida con  los inversionistas de KIVA y les dice: “Gracias por el apoyo que siempre brindan, sobre todo a los jóvenes profesionales!”
texts.en:
Susan is single and 26. She successfully finished her university courses. She studied to be an elementary teacher and is now working at a private school teaching the youngest students, five-year-old children. Susan has worked with our institution, EDAPROSPO, for six months. She will use the loan to pay graduation and diploma costs. One of her dearest dreams was to achieve her degree as “Early Education Teacher,” as it will give her more employment opportunities. 

Susan is very excited about her loan, as it will help her speed up the university paperwork. She thanks the Kiva lenders and says, "Thanks for the support you always offer, especially to young professionals!"

loans.use: to pay graduation and diploma costs.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: Francisco es un hombre emprendedor, casado, con 48 años de edad, con un hijo de 15 años, su negocio es de brindar servicio de acarreo en los diferentes puntos de la capital por ende en los mercados capitalinos, esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace seis años consecutivos. Este crédito lo quiere invertir en las mejoras de su vehículo como es el overjol, pinturas, cambio de llantas, cambio de accesorios etc.
texts.en: Francisco’s an enterprising, married, 48-year-old man with a 15-year-old son.  His business is providing hauling services between points in the capital city among markets in the capital.  He’s been doing this activity for six consecutive years.  He needs the loan to do improvements like overhaul, paint, tire change, accessory change, etc. to his vehicle.

loans.use: to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé en mai 2007.IL est composé de membres qui sont issus du même quartier.Elles ont comme principale activité le commerce.

Celle qui est à l'extrême droite sur la photo et levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe.Elle est âgée de 39 ans,elle est mariée et mére d'une fille de 12 ans.

Sa principale activité est le commerce de tissus traditionnels bazin,elle dispose d'une bonne expérience pour ce type d'activité car l'ayant pratiqué depuis plusieurs années.

Avec son prêt,elle compte acheter 30 métres de tissus pour une valeur de 300000f.

Son objectif est d'augmenter son épargne,assurer la scolarité de sa fille et participer aux charges familliales.
texts.en:
This group was created in May 2007. It is composed of members from the same district. Their main work involves commerce.

The one in the photo at the far right with her arm raised is the group's official. She is 39 years old, married, and the mother of a 12-year-old daughter. 

Her main work involves commerce in traditional damask cloth. She has good experience in this kind of business for having worked at it for several years. 

With her loan, she intend to purchase 30 meters of cloth valued at 300,000 francs.

Her goal is to increase her savings, ensure her daughter's schooling fees, and help cover family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to sell

loans.name: Yesica Marilu

texts.es:
Yesica es una joven de 25 años de edad madre de un hijo el cual está en primer año de preparatoria en un estado civil de unión libre. Ella curso hasta el primer año de carrera y no pudo continuar estudiando porque ella joven se comprometió. Su único apoyo para la caficultura es su pareja con la cual desarrollan y emprenden un trabajo colectivo hace más de 5 años; pero fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron desde muy joven esta actividad. Fueron sus padres los que le heredaron la tierra que hoy en día su pareja y ella trabaja y asisten. 

Hoy Yesica asiste a COMIXMUL para que se le pueda apoyar con un crédito para la compra de insumos que ayudaran a asegurar sus cultivos, a mantenerlos sanos para que al final la cosecha sea un éxito.

Sus sueños son los de lograr preparar a su hijo y a los próximos que DIOS le dé para que sean personas preparadas y autosuficientes para que puedan dar a sus hogares estabilidad y seguridad.
texts.en:
Yesica is a young 25-year old woman who is the mother of one son who is in Grade 1; she lives in a common-law marriage. She studied until the first year of a degree but was not able to continue studying because she became engaged while young. Her only support in the cultivation of coffee is her partner. They have been carrying out and performing work together for more than 5 years. But it was her parents who taught her this occupation when she was very young. It was from her parents that she inherited the land that she and her partner currently work on and care for.

Today Yesica is attending COMIXMUL to seek support with a loan for the purchase of supplies that will help her ensure her crops and keep them safe so that in the end her harvest is a success.

Her dream is to successfully prepare her son and any other children that GOD might give her to be self-sufficient and resourceful people who will bring stability and security to their homes.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to care for her coffee crops

loans.name: Mary

texts.es:
Mary de 45 años de edad, es una mujer casada que tiene dos hijos en las edades de 20 y 22 años. Desde hace 8 años, por la necesidad de ayudar los gastos del hogar, vio en la venta de  productos de belleza y medicinales una buena opción para lograrlo y por eso decidida e impulsada por los proveedores de productos de belleza a través de las reuniones a las que asistía,  empezó con pocos artículos y mas adelante  amplió su oferta con una diversificada gama de ellos, enmarcados en los pedidos  de su creciente clientela.  Sus ventas las realiza de contado y también a crédito en su vecindad y entre familiares y amigos, que cada día le refieren nuevos compradores de los servicios de masajes relajantes que ofrece en su propia camilla  y la venta de productos asociados a la belleza y a la estética.  
En la actualidad Mary ha recibido dos financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante los cuales ha fortalecido gradualmente su negocio, pues ha incrementado su capital de compras y ha generado nuevas ganancias, apoyando así los gastos de educación superior de sus hijos. Su meta personal es lograr que su hijo termine los estudios universitarios, mientras su meta de negocios es lograr  mas adelante, tener un local exclusivo y bien dotado, para impactar sus ventas, porque su desafío es la competencia en los productos de belleza y en la publicidad de sus servicios de masajes. Actualmente está aplicando a un credikiva, mediante el cual comprará perfumería, cremas capilares e insumos, como toallas desechables, artículos mediante los cuales desea prestar un mejor servicio y aumentar sus ganancias, para hacer de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Mary, 45 years old, is married with two children ages 20 and 22. Eight years ago, she decided to start her own business selling beauty products and medicinal products in order to help pay her family's household expenses. She started out by working with some beauty suppliers and attending their meetings. In time, Mary began to diversify her merchandise and offer a bigger variety of products, responding to the orders her customers put in. Mary allows her customers to purchase items with cash or on credit. She sells principally to her neighbors and friends. Also, each day she gets referred to new customers for the relaxing massage services she offers. Mary owns her own massage bed to complement her beauty product sales.

Mary has already received two loans through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which have helped her to gradually strengthen her business. She has increased her working capital as well as her earnings. This has helped her to support her children and pay for them to receive a higher education. Mary's personal goals include seeing her children graduate from college. Her business goals include one day opening a well-equipped store and further improving her sales. Challenges she faces in reaching this goal are gaining greater competency with her beauty products and marketing her massage services. 

Currently, Mary is applying for a Kiva loan in order to buy perfume, capillary creams, disposable towels, and other supplies she needs in order to improve the services she offers and increase her earnings. This will make her loan a successful investment.

loans.use: to buy perfume, capillary creams, disposable towels and other supplies.

loans.name: Libier

texts.es: Libier, está en unión libre, tiene la edad 31 años y vive con su esposa e hijo. El con el crédito pretende comprar cerdos para el engorde de ellos luego venderlos. El espera con este nuevo proyecto poder tenerlos rápido para la venta y aprovechar el buen precio del mercado actualmente. El tiene como meta poder generarle el máximo de las ganancias para salir adelante con los pagos de su crédito y mejorar la estabilidad de su hogar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Libier lives in a common law relationship.  He’s 31-years-old living with his wife and son.  He intends to use the loan to buy pigs to fatten up and then sell.  He hopes with this new project to have them ready for sale quickly to take advantage of the current good market price.  His goal is to generate the highest possible profits to get ahead with his loan payments and improve his home stability.  This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans from state banks and Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten up.

loans.name: Ricardo Raul

texts.es: El sr. Ricardo tiene 42 años, convive con la Sra. Bertha por mas de 14 años, tienen 4 hijos dependientes que actualmente cursan el nivel primario y secundario del colegio, estudian en escuelas fiscales debido a que no cuentan con suficientes ingresos para pagar colegios particulares. El sr. Ricardo estudio hasta el nivel primario y por malas influencias de sus amigos y por la falta de concejos de sus padres no termino el colegio y empezó a trabajar de joven en diferentes rubros, hace aproximadamente un año vivió en el departamento de Santa Cruz pero el costo de vida es muy alta por lo que decidió vivir en el departamento de Cochabamba  donde actualmente radica. Actualmente el sr. Ricardo trabaja de chofer de un tracto camión. El credito solicitado es para la construcción de habitaciones para sus hijos, lo que mejorara su estilo de vida de la familia.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 42 years old. He lives with Bertha. He has lived with her for more than 14 years. They have 4 dependent children who are in primary and secondary school at the moment. They go to public schools as the family does not have sufficient income to pay for private school.

Ricardo completed his primary school studies. However, because of the bad influence of his friends and because his parents did not give him a lot of advice he did not finish secondary school. In fact he started to work at a young age, doing different kinds of work. Approximately one year ago he lived in the Santa Cruz region but the cost of living is very high there, so he decided to move to the Cochabamba area. This is where he lives at present. At the moment Ricardo works as a trailer truck driver. 

The loan requested is for the construction of bedrooms for his children, which will improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to construct bedrooms

loans.name: Sottourou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé en mai 20007.Il est composé de membres qui sont issus de la même zone et elles ont pour activité principale le petit commerce.

Celle qui lève le bras sur la photo est la représentante du groupe, elle est mariée et âgée de 17 ans,elle est mère de 02 enfants.

Avec l'argent du financement,elle compte acheter 67 litres d'huile de palme pour une valeur de 50000f,250kg de mangues pour une valeur de 50000f,250kg de fruits sauvage pour une valeur de 5000f et 30000f de poisson fumés.

Son objectif est d'augmenter son épargne et participer aux frais de la gestion quotidienne de sa maison.
texts.en:
This group was created in May 2007. It is composed of members from the same area. Their main work involves small-scale commerce.

The one in the photo with her arm raised is the group's representative. She is married, 17 years old, and a mother of two. 

With the finance money, she intends to purchase 67 liters of palm oil valued at 50,000 francs, 250 kg of mangoes valued at 5,000 francs, and 30,000 francs of smoked fish. 

Her goal is to increase her savings and help cover the day-to-day costs of managing her house.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil, wild fruit, and smoked fish

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Ruth works hard to support her family. She has a business selling used clothing in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from raising pigs. Ruth is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell for her business.

Ruth has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase used clothes to sell

loans.name: Natasha

texts.en:
Natasha wants to buy pesticides to use them for her plants. This will be her first time requesting a loan. Like so many others in the region, her focus has been on seasonal agriculture these past twenty years. 

She resides in the southeastern part of the country, known for the largest production of red onions, potatoes, and chickpeas. The region also grows, in small quantities, delicious blueberries, called 'boronica' in the regional Albanian dialect, and the villagers sell them fresh or dried. They are costly though, and unfortunately, not everyone buys them.

Natasha has three children and lives in rural southeastern Albania. The field in the background is where she plants her produce. Her photo was taken right after an intense day of labor.

loans.use: to buy pesticides for her plants.

loans.name: Zhamila

texts.ru: Жамиле 44 года. Она замужем и имеет 2 детей. Детям 20 и 15 лет. Ее муж без рабочий. Жамила более 25 лет работает в местной поликлинике медсестрой. Она окончила Медицинский колледж, благодаря поддержке своих родителей. Она благодарна своим родителям за то, что они помогли ей получить специальность. Она зарабатывает деньги честным трудом. Она является единственным кормильцем в семье. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для проведения торжества в честь рождения ее внука, так как недавно ее дочь родила ребенка. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zhamila is 44, married, and has two children, ages 20 and 15. Her husband is unemployed. Zhamila has worked in the local clinic as a nurse for over 25 years. She graduated from medical college thanks to her parents' support and is grateful that they helped her to become a nurse. She makes a living doing honest work and is the sole breadwinner for her family. She has requested a loan of 1500 somoni for a celebration in honor of her first grandchild, as her daughter recently had a baby. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to celebrate the birth of her first grandchild

loans.name: Villa Flores Group

texts.es:
La señora Angelica Veronica  de estado civil soltera, tiene 23 años de edad, curso 3 años de educación básica, ella se dedica a la confección de tejidos como cortes y guipiles, inició este negocio aprendiendo con su madre y hasta la fecha lleva 13 años de experiencia, ella cuenta con el apoyo de su familia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de hilos para poder confeccionar sus jetidos, en el futuro desea vender su mercadería fuera del país; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la confección de guipiles y cortes. En la fotografia solo aparecen 9 integrantes puesto que uno de ellas se le dificultó presentarse cuando tomaron la foto.
texts.en:
Señora Angelica Veronica is single, 23 years old, attended three years of basic education, and makes a living by making textiles like skirts and guipiles (traditional Guatemalan blouses).  She began this business after learning it from her mother, and up to this day has 13 years of experience.  She relies on the support of her family.

She organized a group and requested a loan which she will use to buy thread to be able to make her textiles.  In the future she wishes to sell her merchandise outside of the country.  

The other members of the group make a living by making guipiles and skirts.

In the picture, only 9 borrowers appear because it was difficult for one of the members to be present when the photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy thread for making textiles.

loans.name: Errol

texts.es: Errol, está casado, tiene una hija pero no vive con ellas. El con el crédito va compra abarrotes para surtir aun más su pequeño local y también para comprar insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El tiene pensado como meta lograr aumentar sus ganancias para su bienestar económica y brindarle un mejor futuro a su hija a la vez poder ofrecerle el estudio para que se supere y pueda ejercer una profesión a su gusto. El también espera superarse como  persona y lograr mantener sus ideales con su negocio de llegar a ser un proyecto más firme en la comunidad.  Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Errol is married and has a daughter but he lives separated from his family. With this loan, he will buy supplies to better stock his grocery store as well as supplies to use on his coffee plants. Errol plans to increase his earnings so he will be able to improve his financial situation and provide his daughter with a better future. He wants to give his daughter a good education so that she will be able to study a career that she enjoys. 

Errol also hopes to improve personally by making his business more stable and increasing its presence in the community. This is his second loan from FUDECOSUR. Errol has never taken out any loans with national banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with much better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his coffee plants as well as groceries to stock his store.

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres De San Lorenzo Group

texts.es: duo Mujeres de san Lorenzo el cubo, este grupo esta integrado por la señora Aura Leticia de 40 años tiene 5 hijos (4 son menores de edad y un hijo ya mayor de edad) ella se dedica a la elaboración de muñequitos típicos (muñecos quitapenas)tiene ya más de 6 años que se dedica a esta actividad, ella solicita que la apoyen  en otro crédito ya que este es su 4to crédito y lo solicita para la compra de materiales para elaborar los muñecos y poder elaborar mas ya que tiene una gran demanda de muñequitos ya que ella tiene una gran demanda y ha podido satisfacer a sus clientes, espera que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
Aura Leticia is a member of the Dúo San Lorenzo El Cubo Group. She is 40 years old and has five children (four are minors and one is an adult).

She works making typical quitapenas dolls (very small dolls that are tucked into bed with children who are worried about some problem so the child can sleep peacefully while the doll worries for them). She has more than six years experience in this work.

She is asking for support through another loan as this is their 4th loan. She is asking in order to buy supplies to make dolls so she can create more as there is a great demand for dolls and she has many requests and has been able to satisfy her customers. She is hoping for your support with the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make typical dolls

location.town: Aldea San Lorenzo el Cubo,Ciudad Vieja Sacatepeque

loans.name: Ezequiel Group

texts.es: Está formado este grupo por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Gloria tiene 42 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos de 14, 9, 4 y 6 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y la venta de raspado  desde hace 20 años , el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa como  pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, zapatos de varón, zapatos de damas, paca de sabanas, zapatos usados para niños etc. Arlen tiene 27 años de edad y su negocio es una pulpería y Cinthya su negocio es la venta de hielo, helados y venta de zapatos por catálogo.
texts.en:
This group consists of three enterprising female members. One of them is 42-year-old Gloria. She has a partner and four children, who are 14, 9, 6, and 4 years of age. She has been selling clothing and shaved ice for 20 years. She will invest the loan in purchasing clothes, such as men’s pants, women’s pants, men’s shoes, ladies’ shoes, bundles of sheets, and second-hand shoes for children. 

Arlen is 27 years old and has a grocery store. Cinthya sells ice and ice-creams, and she also sells shoes via catalogues.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, such as men's pants, women's pants, men's shoes, ladies' shoes, bundles of sheets, and second-hand shoes for children

loans.name: Odilie

texts.es: Doña odilie es una señora muy trabajadora. ella todos los dias se levanta temprano para ir a su terreno a sembrar piña. ahora ella desea mejorar sus ingresos económicos para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. por lo que solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones (1.000.000) para comprar mas insumos e hiervicidas para sembrar mas piña.
texts.en: Odilie is a very hardworking woman.  Every day she gets up early to go to her plot of land to plant pineapple.  Now she wants to improve her income to give her family a better quality of life.  She's requesting a loan for 1,000,000 colones [CRC] to buy more inputs and herbicides to plant more pineapple.

loans.use: to buy inputs for planting

loans.name: Eloy

texts.es: Don Eloy es señor muy trabajador. el tiene una vaca con la que produce leche para vender en la comunidad. sin embargo necesita poder aumentar la producción, por lo que solicita un préstamo de un millón de colones (1.000.000) para comprar dos vacas mas y así poder mejorar su negocio
texts.en: Eloy is a very hardworking man. He owns a dairy cow and he sells its milk to his community. However, he needs to increase his production, and for this reason he is requesting a loan of one million (1,000,000) colones to buy two more cows in orders to improve his activity.

loans.use: To buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Odoney

texts.es: Odoney, tiene la edad de 43 años, está casado, tiene una hija, pero actualmente no vive con ella, pero es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar la semilla y mejorar cercas para su finca. El actualmente cuenta con una pequeña lechería y necesita hacerle unas mejoras a su infraestructura y su repasto para darles a sus animales un mejor cuido. El espera obtener de sus vacas el máximo de producción y con los ingresos mejorar su calidad de vida y darle un futuro menos incierto a su hija que es su mayor prioridad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Odoney, is 43 years old. He is married and has a daughter. She doesn't live with him, but she is Odoney's biggest priority. With this loan, Odoney will buy seeds and repair some fences on his farm. He currently owns a small dairy farm and needs to do some repairs and improve his fields in order to better care for his cattle. Odoney hopes to obtain the best production possible from his cattle so that with the earnings he can improve his quality of life and provide his daughter with a more stable future. 

This is Odoney's first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has never taken out any loans through the national banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with much better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his dairy farm.

loans.name: Precy

texts.en:
Precy is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 11,000 PHP (Philippine pesos) through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Precy has been in this business for 15 years. She earns additional income from raisig pigs.

Precy has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell

loans.name: Branko

texts.en:
Branko has been a camera operator for the past eight years. “For someone to be a cameraman they need to be gifted first, and then have a love for people, commitment, and of course the right type of attitude,” is what Branko said.

He wants to buy some filming equipment with the loan he is requesting from Kiva lenders. Branko is a 44-year-old father of two - a daughter, 16, and a son, 10 years old - who, together with his family, immigrated to Greece and lived there for very long time. Now he is back in his homeland in a rural village in northeastern Albania and trying to do something here. “Is much better and easier in your home, I guess” Branko said.

loans.use: to buy filming equipment.

loans.name: Fatmir

texts.en:
Fatmir is fifty-two years old and a father of five children, with all of them attending school. He lived in Greece for long time until five years ago when he decided to come back to his country to a little rural village located in the southeastern part of the country and practice as a van/bus driver. He is the only one to bring an income home. They also generate a small income from the sales of their agro-livestock fresh produce.

Fatmir has been operating this currently rundown passenger minivan for the past five years. In Albanian this kind of van is called “furgon.” He needs to repair this vehicle and replace the engine with a new one, and this is why he is applying for a loan now. He remains confident that lenders will help him financially and he promises to them to pay back the loan on time.

loans.use: to repair the passenger minivan that he operates.

loans.name: Jean Carlos

texts.es: Jean es un joven que se dedica  al negocio de la venta de ropa y zapatos nuevos con su esposa y su pequeño hijo en la ciudad de Estelí  él está solicitando este crédito para comprar zapatos, camisas, vestidos y bisutería. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa y su familia lo que gana con su negocio es su único ingreso  el lugar donde lo tiene es un buen punto  ya que tiene sus clientes y a sus amistades sus metas a futuro son hacer crecer con más variedades de ropa, zapatos y perfumes y su meta próxima es aumentar su inventario para vender más y  obtener mejores ganancias que le permita crecer como comerciante.
texts.en:
Jean is a young man who makes a living in selling new clothing and shoes with his wife and small son in the city of Estelí.

He is requesting this loan in order to buy shoes, shirts, dresses, and imitation jewelry.  He has the support of his wife and family.  This business is their only source of income.  Their shop is located in a good spot near customers and friends.  

His goals for the future are to grow the variety of clothing, shoes, and perfumes he offers.  His next goal is to grow his inventory so that he can sell more items and make better profits.  This will allow him to grow as a businessman.

loans.use: to buy shoes, shirts, dresses, and imitation jewelry.

loans.name: Aracely Esmeralda

texts.es:
Aracely, vive con su familia, su esposo y tiene cuatro hijos, uno de ellos esta casado y los otros tres dependen económicamente de ella, no posee familiares en el extranjero. Aracely, se dedica a la venta de antojitos tales como: enchilada, pasteles, yuca frita y salcochada, entre otros y luego comenzó en a invertir en otras áreas, el oficio lo realiza de 10:00am a 6:00pm, el negocio es heredado.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar una plancha pupusera y una vajilla de trastos; esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar las condiciones del negocio y aumentar sus ventas, ya que se le dificulta realizar los bocadillos por lo que no cuenta con una plancha.
Su sueño es mejorar su negocio y en el futuro construir su propia casa, colocar e inaugurar un restaurante con los platillos típicos de El Salvador.
texts.en:
Aracely lives with her family, composed of her husband and their four children, one of whom is married while the other three depend economically on her. None of her relatives lives abroad. Aracely engages in selling snacks such as enchiladas, pies, fried or boiled yucca; she has also started investing in other activities. She has inherited her activity, and she works form 10 am to 6 pm.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a grill for “pupusas”* and disposable tableware; this investment will help her improve the conditions of her shop and increase her sales, as not having a grill makes it difficult for her to prepare her sandwiches.
She dreams of improving her activity and of building her own house in the future, as well as to set up and inaugurate a restaurant where to sell El Salvador’s typical dishes.
*Pupusas are a traditional Salvadoran dish made of thick, hand-made corn tortilla filled with a blend of either cheese, vegetables or meat.

loans.use: To buy a grill for “pupusas”* and disposable tableware.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es: la Sra. Sara tiene 19 años, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa según la temporada,  ella vende sus producto de manera ambulante visitando distintos mercados  y ferias,  este préstamo es su  primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Sara va a usar este préstamo para la compra de ropa por mayor como chompas y chamarras  para surtir su negocio ya que se acerca la época de frio, y esta época tiene mucha venta e incluso pedidos , su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital, la Sra. Sara enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia diaria, va a utilizar los beneficios en comprar un puesto de venta, su deseo para su negocio tener mercadería surtida para ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes, la Sra. Sara se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que le permite mejorar en su negocio.
texts.en:
Sara is 19 and sells seasonal clothing. She sells her product as a street vendor, visiting various markets and fairs. This is her first loan with the institution. Sarah is going to use the loan to purchase clothing at wholesale, such as sweaters and jackets for supplying her business, as the cold season is approaching and in this season she has a lot of sales, and even orders. 

Her reason for requesting this loan is lack of working capital. Sara is facing challenges in her business such as daily competition. She is going to use the profits to buy a stall. Her desire for her business is to have merchandise stocked, so that she can offer a variety of products to her customers. Sara feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support provided, as it allows her to improve her business.

loans.use: To buy winter clothing.

loans.name: Resurrection

texts.en:
Resurrection works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Resurrection requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippine pesos) loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for 6 years now.

In the future, Resurrection would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Mevludi

texts.en:
Mevludi is 43 years old. He lives in the small village of Gurjaani District with his wife and two sons. Several times, Mevludi requested a loan from local financial institutions for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan request was rejected each time because of low income and his family’s poor living conditions. 

Mevludi does physical work as an artisan and he gets a small, monthly income. It is hardly enough for food for the family. According to Credo estimations, the family belongs to the 'subsistence poor' category. 

Mevludi requested a loan from Credo to start-up a family business. Mevludi has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits, with soft conditions to rural poor people, who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as 'high risk borrowers' because of their low income. 

With his credit, Mevludi will purchase piglets to raise and then resell at a higher price. This will increase the income of the family. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to raise and resell at a higher price.

loans.name: Bidzina

texts.en:
Bidzina is 52 years old. He lives in the small village of Telavi District with his wife and son. Bidzina requested loans from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. His loan requests were rejected all the time because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 

Bidzina serves local people as a taxi driver and gets income. Besides this, he has a vineyard and produces wine for selling. It is hardly enough for food for the family. According to Credo estimations the family belongs to the 'subsistence poor' category. 

Bidzina requested a loan from Credo to start-up family business. Bidzina has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages the provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as 'high risk borrowers' because of their low income. 

With his credit Bidzina will begin trade livestock. He plans to purchase 5 calves, raise, and resell them at a good price. This will increase the income of their family. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to begin livestock trade.

loans.name: Al-Zahra Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Zahra. It consists of five ladies who live in Sana'a, Yemen. 

Latifa is a 43-year-old woman who is married woman and has 8 children. She lives in Sana'a, Yemen. She is a friendly, enthusiastic, hardworking individual. All of her efforts are geared toward moving herself forward. She is a housewife who takes care of her family. She would like to spend her leisure time watching television, but unfortunately she doesn`t have enough money to buy a television, so she has applied for a loan to buy a television to use for the house. 

She hopes to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy a television to use for the house.

loans.name: Xhevrije

texts.en:
Xhevrije is a member of the Egyptian vulnerable ethnic minority community who live in a village in the northern Albania. She has been practicing livestock for the past five years. She’s got two children in their twenties and is married.

Xhevrije wants to buy a cow from a good breed and this loan of 150,000 Albanian Lek will help her do just that. Usually such cows produce 40-45 kg of milk per day with the right care and food. “I need to increase the fresh milk produce in order to provide a better to my family. For the moment though, I just want to invest only in one cow, but my plans include adding some more dairy animals in the near future,” Xhevrije stated.

Kindly note that the majority of the ethnics are concentrated in the cities and towns, and in our case here, we have an ethnic member who has decided to live in the rural in an attempt to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a cow from a good breed.

loans.name: Drita

texts.en:
Drita wants to start a business this summer by selling items to the beachgoers in one of the most populated beaches of the northern Albania. Kindly note that this is only a summer season type of activity, yet the income that someone can generate out of it is very good, according to Drita. 

She has four young aged children who attend school regularly. Prior to coming to their current location of residence, they lived high up in the very rural region where life was challenging, especially before the infrastructure started developing during these past seven years. Albania nowadays has a very developed infrastructure that makes it a favorite vacation destination for millions of foreign visitors. Last year, Albania was visited by approximately 4 million tourists throughout the year.

loans.use: to stock up on items to sell to beachgoers at a populated beach.

loans.name: Honest Is The Best Policy Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the “Honest is the Best Policy” group from Lunsar, a town in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan of SLL 500,000 each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Zainab is the featured leader of this group. The 38-year-old is a native of Lunsar. She is married and has been doing business for many years now. Zainab sells onions. She has requested this loan in order to buy onions in large quantities to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy onions in large quantities to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself as kind. She will use the loan of 9990 KES (Kenyan shillings) to buy a water tank. Five members of her family will benefit from the water tank as the family faces lack of water storage facilities. Mary runs a green grocery to earn an income.This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan was paid successfully. She hopes that in future she will be a poultry farmer.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is divorced and has four children. Even though she did not receive any formal education, Alice is a successful businesswoman. She sells plastic products and bags in Ab Nkwanta (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about 14 years. As the sole breadwinner in her family, Alice uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Alice will use this loan to purchase more plastic products and bags, thus helping her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Alice plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase more plastic products and bags, thus helping her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Sergio Isaac

texts.es: Sergio, es un joven de 27 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad colonial de Granada, estudiante de la carrera de administración de empresas, en la vida ha tenido obstáculos para culminar su carrera por falta de recursos económicos, hoy en día da gracias a Dios por trabajar como guía turístico libre lo que le ha permitido ir pagando sus estudios, los cuales ya está por culminar y necesita entrar al curso de titulación, pero su salario es muy bajo, no le permite hacer este gasto de  un solo pago, por lo que solicita el crédito para poder pagar este curso tan importante para su desarrollo personal en el futuro.
texts.en:
Sergio is a young man of 27 who lives in the colonial city of Granada. He is studying for a degree in business administration. He has had obstacles in life to completing his degree, because of lack of financial resources. Today, he thanks God for his work as a freelance tourist guide, which has allowed him to gradually pay for his studies, which he is about to finish. 

He needs to enter the graduation course, but his salary is very low and doesn't allow him to make this expenditure in one payment. He is requesting a loan to enable him to pay for this course, so important for his personal development in the  future.

loans.use: To pay for his graduation course.

loans.name: Reymonda

texts.en:
Reymonda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.

Reymonda requested a 10000 PHP (Philippine peso) loan through NWTF to buy additional spare parts for maintenance.

She has been in this business for 3 years now.

In the future, Reymonda would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for the repair of her motorcycle

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Susan works hard to support her family. She has a food vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from selling frozen foods.
